{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Chihu Rock|It|Chihu Rock}} is Liyue Harbor's lower-class district, located on an island to the southeast of the rest of the city. It is connected via bridges to [[Feiyun Slope]] to the north and [[Mt. Tianheng]] to the west.</p>}}
